    ServerConfiguration
    Springboot 2.7.x to 3.0 Migration Response Header Size The property server.max.http.header.size is deprecated in favour of server.max-http-request-header-size, which checks only the size of the request header.

    WebConfiguration
    This configuration is required to support Springboot 2.7.x to 3.x migration Trailing Slash Matching Configuration Now the “GET /api/v1/todos/name/” doesn’t match anymore by default and will result in an HTTP 404 error.
